TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpClientHandler extends System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler

summary.span: 使用的默认消息处理程序。

span.span: The default message handler used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和从它派生的类使开发人员若要配置的各种选项范围从代理到身份验证。The class and classes derived from it enable developers to configure a variety of options ranging from proxies to authentication. ### 在.NET Core 中的 HttpClientHandlerHttpClientHandler in .NET Core 从.NET Core 2.1类而不是`HttpClientHandler`提供了使用的网络 Api 的更高级别的 HTTP 的实现。Starting with .NET Core 2.1, the class instead of `HttpClientHandler` provides the implementation used by higher-level HTTP networking APIs. 可以配置应用程序以使用`HttpClientHandler`改为通过调用方法，如下所示：You can configure your application to use `HttpClientHandler` instead by calling the method as follows: ```csharp AppContext.SetSwitch("System.Net.Http.useSocketsHttpHandler", false); ``` ```vb AppContext.SetSwitch("System.Net.Http.useSocketsHttpHandler", False) ``` ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.net.http.httpclienthandler/cs/source.cs#1)] 前面的代码示例使用`async Task Main()`入口点。The preceding code example uses an `async Task Main()` entry point. 该功能需要 C# 7.1 或更高版本。That feature requires C# 7.1 or later.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowAutoRedirect { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowAutoRedirect : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否应跟随重定向响应。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler should follow redirection responses.

value.span: 如果处理程序应跟随重定向响应;否则为。

span.span: if the handler should follow redirection responses; otherwise .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`true`如果你想要到新位置的资源自动遵循 HTTP 重定向标头的处理程序。Set to `true` if you want the handler to automatically follow HTTP redirection headers to the new location of the resource. 要遵循的重定向的最大数目设置属性。The maximum number of redirections to follow is set by the property. 如果设置为`false`，所有来自 HTTP 响应的 HTTP 状态代码 300 到 399 返回到应用程序。If is set to `false`, all HTTP responses with an HTTP status code from 300 to 399 are returned to the application. 在自动重定向清除授权标头，且该处理程序会自动尝试到重定向的位置重新进行身份验证。The Authorization header is cleared on auto-redirects and the handler automatically tries to re-authenticate to the redirected location. 在实践中，这意味着，应用程序不能自定义身份验证将信息放到授权标头是否可能会遇到重定向。In practice, this means that an application can't put custom authentication information into the Authorization header if it is possible to encounter redirection. 相反，应用程序必须实现和注册自定义身份验证模块。Instead, the application must implement and register a custom authentication module. > [!NOTE] > 与设置为`true`，即使在重定向到 HTTP URI 从 HTTPS URI 时，.NET Framework 将遵循重定向。With set to `true`, the .NET Framework will follow redirections even when being redirected to an HTTP URI from an HTTPS URI. .NET core 版本 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 版不会使用重定向从 HTTPS 到 HTTP，即使设置为`true`。.NET Core versions 1.0, 1.1 and 2.0 will not follow a redirection from HTTPS to HTTP even if is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET framework 4.x`System.Net.Http`二进制全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 中，默认值是。For the .NET Framework 4.x `System.Net.Http` binary in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), the default value is . 当[ `System.Net.Http` NuGet 包](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http/)v4.1.0 到 v4.3.2 使用，则默认为和。When the [`System.Net.Http` NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http/) v4.1.0 to v4.3.2 is used, the default is and . NuGet 包 v4.3.2 的默认值后使用。After NuGet package v4.3.2, the default value of is used.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于通过处理程序存储服务器 Cookie 的 Cookie 容器。

value.span: 用于通过处理程序存储服务器 Cookie 的 Cookie 容器。

span.span: The cookie container used to store server cookies by the handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供的实例类，该类包含与此处理程序关联的 cookie。The property provides an instance of the class that contains the cookies associated with this handler. 如果属性是`true`，则属性表示用来存储服务器 cookie 的 cookie 容器。If the property is `true`, the property represents the cookie container used to store the server cookies. 用户可以使用此属性的请求在发送之前设置自定义 cookie。The user can set custom cookies before sending requests using this property. 如果属性为 false，并且用户将添加到 cookie ，cookie 会被忽略，且不会发送到服务器。If the property is false and the user adds cookies to , cookies are ignored and not sent to the server. 设置到`null`将引发异常。Setting the to `null` will throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .property class System.Func`5<class System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain, valuetype System.Net.Security.SslPolicyErrors, bool> DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator
Public Shared ReadOnly Property DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator As Func(Of HttpRequestMessage, X509Certificate2, X509Chain, SslPolicyErrors, Boolean)

public: static property Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator { Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取始终返回 的缓存委托。

span.span: Gets a cached delegate that always returns .

value.span: 始终返回 的缓存委托。

span.span: A cached delegate that always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尤其是在测试方案，一种常见模式使用连接到具有不应验证，如自签名证书的证书的服务器。Particularly in test scenarios, a common pattern use to connect to a server with a certificate that shouldn't be validated, such as a self-signed certificate. 通常为此可以使用通过设置属性设置为始终返回一个委托`True`; 这表明证书已通过验证。You commonly do this with by setting the property to a delegate that always returns `True`; this indicates that the certificate has passed validation. 但是，并非所有实现都支持此回调中，并且某些引发。However, not all implementations support this callback, and some throw . 属性解决此限制。The property addresses this limitation. 通过返回的委托属性可以分配给属性，作为下面的示例执行：The delegate returned by the property can be assigned to the property, as the following example does: ```cs handler.ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback = httpClientHandler.DangerousAcceptAnyServerCertificateValidator; ``` 这样，实现表示开发人员的意图的已知的对象引用标识。This gives implementations a known object reference identity that expresses the developer's intention. 如果该对象存储在属性是引用等于，运行时能够完全禁用验证，否则会引发的平台上。If the object stored in the property is reference equals to , the runtime is able to entirely disable validation on a platform that would otherwise throw a . 作为额外的好处是，开发人员可以使用此属性来简化工具来标记禁用证书验证，这使得开发人员若要避免传送不安全的应用程序更轻松的危险。As a side benefit, developers can use this property to make it easier for tools to flag the danger of disabling certificate validation, which makes it easier for developers to avoid shipping insecure applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

summary.span: 获取或设置使用 对象发出请求时允许的最大并发连接数（每个服务器终结点）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent connections (per server endpoint) allowed when making requests using an object.

summary.span: 请注意，该限制针对每个服务器终结点，例如，值为 256 表示允许 256 个到 http://www.adatum.com/ 的并发连接，以及另外 256 个到 http://www.adventure-works.com/ 的并发连接。

span.span: Note that the limit is per server endpoint, so for example a value of 256 would permit 256 concurrent connections to http://www.adatum.com/ and another 256 to http://www.adventure-works.com/.

value.span: （每个服务器终结点） 的并发连接允许的最大数目对象。

span.span: The maximum number of concurrent connections (per server endpoint) allowed by an object.

value.span: 默认值为 2 GB。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以设置属性设置为较低的值来限制请求缓冲区的大小。An app can set the property to a lower value to limit the size of the request buffer. 如果请求内容的大小大于属性，将引发异常。If the size of the request content is greater than the property, an exception is thrown.

value.span: 最大长度，以千字节 （1024 字节为单位），响应标头。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否随请求发送授权标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler sends an Authorization header with the request.

value.span: 表示处理程序在发生身份验证之后随请求一起发送 HTTP 授权标头；否则为 。

span.span: for the handler to send an HTTP Authorization header with requests after authentication has taken place; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对特定的客户端请求后成功进行身份验证，如果属性是`true`并在提供凭据，中提供的凭据列表匹配属性。After a client request to a specific is successfully authenticated, if the property is `true` and credentials are supplied, matches against the credential list supplied in the property. 授权标头与每个请求发送到任何相匹配的特定于直到最后一个正斜杠。The Authorization header is sent with each request to any that matches the specific up to the last forward slash. 如果客户端请求到特定是不成功进行身份验证，请求使用标准身份验证过程。If the client request to a specific is not successfully authenticated, the request uses standard authentication procedures. 第一个请求，除了属性指示是否将发送到的后续请求使用的身份验证信息相匹配的特定于直到而无需等待最后一个正斜杠服务器的质询。With the exception of the first request, the property indicates whether to send authentication information with subsequent requests to a that matches the specific up to the last forward slash without waiting to be challenged by the server.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::IWebProxy ^ Proxy { System::Net::IWebProxy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::IWebProxy ^ value); };
member this.Proxy : System.Net.IWebProxy with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置处理程序使用的代理信息。

span.span: Gets or sets proxy information used by the handler.

value.span: 处理程序使用的代理信息。

span.span: The proxy information used by the handler.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识对象，用于处理对 Internet 资源的请求。The property identifies the object to use to process requests to Internet resources. 若要指定应使用任何代理，请设置属性设置为返回的代理实例方法。To specify that no proxy should be used, set the property to the proxy instance returned by the method. 在本地计算机或应用程序配置文件可以指定使用默认代理。The local computer or application config file may specify that a default proxy be used. 如果指定属性，然后从的代理设置属性重写在本地计算机或应用程序配置文件和处理程序将使用指定的代理设置。If the property is specified, then the proxy settings from the property override the local computer or application config file and the handler will use the proxy settings specified. 如果未指定代理配置文件中和属性为未指定，该处理程序使用继承自 Internet 资源管理器在本地计算机上的代理设置。If no proxy is specified in a config file and the property is unspecified, the handler uses the proxy settings inherited from Internet Explorer on the local computer. 如果没有在 Internet Explorer 代理设置，该请求是直接发送到服务器。If there are no proxy settings in Internet Explorer, the request is sent directly to the server. 类分析包含通配符字符的代理跳过列表继承从 Internet 资源管理器相同直接通过 Internet Explorer 分析时跳过列表。The class parses a proxy bypass list with wildcard characters inherited from Internet Explorer the same as the bypass list is parsed directly by Internet Explorer. 例如，类将正则表达式的分析的"nt \*"从 Internet 资源管理器的跳过列表"nt。\*"。For example, the class will parse a bypass list of "nt\*" from Internet Explorer as a regular expression of "nt.\*". 因此的 URL" http://nt.com"将绕过代理帐户使用类并使用 Internet Explorer。So a URL of " http://nt.com" would bypass the proxy using the class and using Internet Explorer. 类支持绕过本地代理。The class supports local proxy bypass. 类会视为目标为本地如果满足以下条件之一：The class considers a destination to be local if any of the following conditions are met: 1. 目标包含平面名称 （在 URL 中没有句点）。The destination contains a flat name (no dots in the URL). 2. 目标包含与环回地址 (或) 或目标包含分配给本地计算机。The destination contains a loopback address ( or ) or the destination contains an assigned to the local computer. 3. 目标的域后缀匹配本地计算机的域后缀 ()。The domain suffix of the destination matches the local computer's domain suffix ().

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证服务器证书的回调方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`发出请求对象应，如果请求服务器进行身份验证使用当前登录用户的凭据。Set this property to `true` when requests made by the object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the credentials of the currently logged on user. 对于客户端应用程序，这是在大多数情况下所需的行为。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 对于中间层应用程序，如 ASP.NET 应用程序，而不是使用此属性，通常会设置属性设置为客户端的名义发出请求的凭据。For middle-tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made.
